lines.text:
[to Tamura as he opens his eyes]
What? You still here? Poor guy, when I'm dead, you can eat this.

[Disgusted by the thought, Tamura leaves]
Come back! You can eat me!

[to soldier who suddenly has stopped moving]
Hey, are you dead?

[to Tamura, who has given him some beans]
I won't forget your kindness as long as I live.
Kill yourself only if you have to. Hare are some rations.
